summary: A comprehensive test suite for IAM functionality that uses mocked AWS services (Moto) to verify creation, update, deletion, and retrieval of users, roles, policies, groups, OIDC providers, server and signing certificates, access keys, password usage, account aliases, credential reports, and CloudFormation integrations.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and robustness of IAM-related code, prevent regressions, and ensure reliable behavior across a wide range of IAM operations in a controlled test environment.
